data.name: SATSIM - Virtual Aerospace Lab
data.detailed_description:
SATSIM is a virtual space hardware simulator and sandbox.


Ever wanted to put together your own space program? With SATSIM, you can assemble cool space hardware for your own missions, or use it to see what's 'under the hood' of real spacecraft and satellites.

We call it a casual space engineering experience. FYI, it's not rocket science ðŸš€

In sandbox mode, you can build your own satellites and powered craft for orbit around and beyond Earth's sphere of influence.

In mission mode, you can investigate, buy, assemble, test and operate your own spacecraft to reach out to any part of the the solar system. Earn experience, trade components, make scientific discoveries and develop alliances to survive an thrive in space.

What will you build first?

SATSIM Physical Experience

The SATSIM software is made to work with the physical models you can build in real life.
